cleaned_text: Dr. Bob advocates the holistic experience, recognizing and honoring the relationships between the physical, emotional, mental and spiritual aspects of our Being. Using the Verbal Diet in positive affirmations, along with aromatherapy, colors, crystals, musical sounds and tuning forks, Energy Medicine aka Vibrational Medicine restores our memory at the cellular level, bringing balance and harmony to the hypothalamus the Great Switchboard of the Brain and the endocrine glands, encouraging normal function and hormone production. Dr. Bob also incorporates the vibrational energies of nutrition and lifestyle, to facilitate holistic balance. While some may consider his work to be "New Age," it is really Ancient ID (ePID) 44767075 Product Key Features Book Title Harmonious Healing : a Guidebook of Energy Medicine for the 21st Century
